text: Within the shunting group, it shall be possible for only one member of the group to transmit the link assurance signal at any time.
When applicable a Security Domain shall Request the OPEN to load, install, extradite, and delete card content,
The Bootstrap Monitor of the DPU-BOOT CSC shall output an error message to the RS-232 interface if an incorrect number of command arguments are entered.

The DPU-SCUI shall be capable of preparing one STPDU for delivery to the SCU every M milliseconds, or shall indicate a No Data condition to the SCU by maintaining an un-incremented ST_PDU Transfer Request Counter field.
Scheme providers must assign unique identifying numbers to merchant acquirers who provide PSAMs
If automatic network selection is implemented, it shall be possible for the driver to activate and deactivate automatic network selection.
The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.
A VCD system MUST provide a user-interface to the economic operator for uploading an existing VCD package
In order to fulfil the requirements of some railways, it should be possible to provide an alternative means of link assurance indication.
The radio shall support at least ten different languages.

If the call fails in the lead traction vehicle, the lead driver will be responsible for re- establishing the call. If the call fails to any other cab, the driver in that cab will call the lead cab and request re-establishment of the call.

The CNG shall classify packets entering the CPN through its WAN interface (downstream direction) according to a number of predefined priorities. Classification can be done on the basis of different layer 2 and/or layer 3 parameters.
The DPU-ADC CSC shall address hardware modules as defined in document 1400, Company X Specification for the Company X Communication/Memory Module.
The card should use a unique diversified secret key, personalized into the card, to generate and authenticate transaction signatures
The PSAM must create a MAC on the updated aggregation record. Aggregation records by card issuer must be stored in the PSAM. They may also be stored in the POS device as well
The Development Team shall be required to adjust existing source code to use the externallog file only if that source code must be modified to implement another requirement.
The Disputes application must conform to the legal requirements as specified by Regulation E and Regulation Z that govern credit card disputes processing.
Contain the details of a transaction between the initialize command for that transaction and the initialize command for the next transaction

Contraindication information should be collected to indicate why vaccinations, treatments, or antidotes may not have been administered or why the patient may not have complied with prescribed interventions.
The DPU-ICUI shall provide ICUI_HK to the DPU-CCM on request.
The MMI shall be suitable for use by day and night.
The DPU-SCUI shall provide the capability for data producing applications to specify whether or not queued data may be segmented.
In case of multicast streams the CNG should support proxy functionalities to optimize the management of information related to signalling.
The ETCS trainborne equipment shall indicate on the DMI the information regarding pantograph and power supply.
The DPU-EDAC shall record the current contents of EDAC_HK to EEPROM and force a DPU watchdog in the event an MBE in DRAM is detected.
In Image Mode, the DPU-DPA shall be capable of binning images at different levels.

Policies and procedures for communicating information to appropriate stakeholders (e.g., state and federal emergency management organizations, FEMA, hazmat teams, public works facilities, intelligence organizations, the media, and the public) should be clearly defined.
Perform the calculation required to generate a signature using the PSAMâ€™s private RSA key, to allow the CEP card to validate the PSAM
The preferred repair facility shall be returned to the user.
The DPU-CCM shall use DPU-EEPRM to access the EEPROM.
The user should be able to personalize bookmarks to UGC.
Therefore, the radio shall provide a priority function for calls from different sources in order to handle contention for the radio.
The terminal must secure transactions by retaining the cardâ€™s symmetric MACing key signature as part of the transaction
System shall let customers cancel their account process shall take no longer than 2 minutes. Database will mark the account as inactive and user will not be able to log into the website.
The load device which supports only off-line PIN verification must support both the off-line PIN encryption method and the off-line PIN plain text verification method as defined in EMV
The weight of the General purpose radio including battery should not exceed 250g.
Track to train transmission shall provide the capability to send different speed profiles for specific train categories.
The CNG may allow secure dynamic firewall opening for remote access devices based on NGN authentication functions.
Information received shall not influence the traction unit(s) with in-operative cabs.
The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.
For the CNG management it is recommended to use a single protocol, so as to minimize the complexity and the cost of the service.

If errors in the card issuer MAC are discovered by the card issuer during its processing of the transactions, a dispute mechanism, established by the scheme provider, may be used to have money refunded
Authorised users within the EIRENE network shall be able to receive calls from calling parties outside the EIRENE network.
The DPU-DCI shall read from the DCI Registers in C-bit words only
Where pre-emption occurs, an advisory indication may be provided to the pre-empted parties.
The system shall support group voice calls.
The card must authenticate the terminal at the point of sale, ensuring that it is genuine and valid, and use a two-way authentication process
The System user interface must be suitable for users with special needs; that is, compatible with specialist software that may be used and with appropriate interface guidelines
The amount to be reversed is the amount of the last step of the transaction. The reversal command sent to the CEP card contains a S2 MAC computed by the PSAM
Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.
The DPU-BOOT CSC shall complete Stage 1 BIT, and load DPU-RTOS in less than A seconds following a hardware reset if CTS is not asserted.
All call related functions shall be possible with the handset on or off the hook.
When the handset is picked up, the loudspeaker shall continue to operate, but at a reduced volume level.

User access should be limited to the permissions granted to their role(s) Each level in the PCG hierarchy will be assigned a role and users will be assigned to these roles. Access to functionality within RFS system is dependent on the privileges/permission assigned to the role..
The DPU-DPA shall calculate drift with respect to the reference frame based on the established guide stars then perform a shift-and-add of the image mode data.

The product must comply with the intranet page standards and requirements of ENET Securities. 95% of the product look & feel will be approved by the Architecture group prior to implementation. The remaining 5% will be corrected and approved within one month of product release.
Structural data of evidence MUST be defined.
The product shall send a meeting confirmation to the meeting organizer.
An audible and visual indication shall be provided to the user that the call is proceeding.
The system shall resolve the zipcode for the street address city and state if zipcode is unknown.
All required fields as specified in the UIS must be marked with a red asterisk alerting theuser to fill the required fields in.

The DPU-CCM shall be able to count a consecutively reported error. When the the count for a particular error ID, exceeds 250 for a particular reporting period, the error code will be replaced with a error code sequence which shall include the original error code and the number of times the error was reported.
The estimator shall search by zipcode with a radius of 30 miles if no parts are found for the preferred parts suppliers
Systems supporting OM should support multiple deployment options (e.g., client server, disconnected, and potentially web based).

If directed network selection and/or automatic network selection are implemented, the driver shall be informed by means of an audible and visual indication of the new network identity whenever a network change takes place without user intervention.
The load device sends S1 in an authorization request to the issuer
When applicable a Security Domain shall Manage on-card data securely,
The System shall utilize currently owned computer equipment.
The system shall provide the capability to open a pop-up window displaying informationabout the specific page along with links to supporting help topics upon selecting each Helplink.
The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.
Product installations and upgrades shall be handled by the middleware technology team within established launch time frames.

LAN interfaces. The CNG shall be equipped with at least one Ethernet (minimum 100 Mbit/s) is interface. Optional interfaces could be present, e.g.: wireless LAN Wi-Fi Alliance certified, Powerlines, Plastic Optical Fiber, USB device and/or host, one or more FXS for analog telephony, DECT Cat-iq.
When the traction unit is stationary the driver shall be required to acknowledge the train trip condition. This acknowledgement will release the emergency brake.
in this case information from trackside has priority.
The card issuer must have the ability to deactivate a CEP application in the response to a load or currency exchange transaction
When applicable a Security Domain shall Communicate with off-card entities in accordance with its Security Domain Providers security policy in Pre-Issuance and Post-Issuance,
The DPU-SCUI shall use DPU-1553 to communicate with the MIL-STD-1553B Interface.
A short audible and visual indication of the incoming call shall be provided.

The merchant acquirer must acknowledge the receipt of the batch to either the POS device or the merchant. The timing of the acknowledgment will vary based on the collection process. After a batch has been acknowledged by the merchant acquirer, it may be deleted from the POS device

The VCD system MUST provide a functionality to compile various data formats from various sources (issuing bodies) into a single VCD package. The VCD package MUST provide a functionality to add structural VCD package data to the VCD package and VCD system (e.g. log file) during the compilation process. The VCD package MUST provide a functionality to add tender-specific data to the VCD package and VCD system (e.g. log file) during the compilation process. The VCD package MUST provide a functionality to add economic operator data to the VCD package and VCD system (e.g. log file) during the compilation process. The VCD package MUST provide a functionality to add tender-specific data to the VCD package and VCD system (e.g. log file) during the compilation process. The VCD package MUST provide a functionality to add structural data of evidence to the VCD package and VCD system (e.g. log file) during the compilation process The VCD package MUST provide a functionality to add evidences to the VCD package and VCD system (e.g. log file) during the compilation process. The VCD package MUST provide a functionality to add translations to the VCD package and VCD system (e.g. log file) during the compilation process
Send transactions to other processors in a standard format defined in agreement with the scheme provider
The DPU-BOOT CSC shall read from EEPROM in 32-bit words only.
When the CNG detects violation of the privacy protection policy the CNG shall discard all signalling, including signalling from the NGN.
The user shall select to view the preferred repair facility ratings.
The DPU-BOOT CSC shall set the processor speed to MHz.
The commands received by a GlobalPlatform card shall be processed by the OPEN or dispatched to the selected Application for processing.
A dedicated Push-To-Talk button shall be provided.
A visual confirmation of the new network identity shall be given to the driver when a manually initiated network change has been completed successfully.
The issuer host must authenticate the card upon the load/unload request
The website shall achieve 99.5% up time.
The DPU-ICUI shall format messages according to DPUICD-01, Section 3.1
Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a listing of students to a cohort.
If shunting mode is implemented, the link assurance tone shall be provided via the loudspeaker.
Product formulas shall allow use of semi-products which have own formulas.

For both the SELECT [by name] [first or only occurrence] command and the SELECT [by name] [next occurrence] command, an Application becomes the selected Application on the Basic Logical Channel if: The requested AID matches (fully or partially) the Application�s AID, The Application being selected is in the correct Life Cycle State, The Application has no restrictions due to multi-selection, and supports the current card interface.
The system must be available for use between 7:00AM and 11:59PM all days of the year.
The Member States shall agree on a common representation format for the information they intend to supply into the knowledge base supporting the tool’s operations.
Systems supporting OM should be able to electronically record and store data from remote devices that may be uploaded to an aggregating system.
The user shall be able to select his preferred language for the display; this setting shall be retained by the radio.
The DPU-SSI shall read from the SSI registers in 16-bit words only.
For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.
Traffic marking: depending on what are the parameters used to perform classification, CNDs or CNG itself on behalf of the CNDs shall be able to modify the packets priority.
The table side of the display shall be split into 2 regions: sequential and temporal.

The PSAM in the POS device generates a merchant acquirer S5 MAC for the transaction and a new S4 MAC for the batch total count and amount and logs the transaction. The amount of the canceled last purchase transaction is subtracted from the header amount. The transaction is kept in a data store associated with the POS device until the merchant acquirer collects it

Currency exchange rates for an unlinked load transaction must be established according the rules of the network or networks processing the transaction. However, for linked load transactions, the currency exchange rates must be established by the card issuer
The CPN shall support remote access, based on NGN network functions.
The DPU-CCM shall quietly discard any unrecognized observatory messages (I.e. messages which do not have a DPU command APID).
If the user requests experience service timeout (threshold), initiation request is cancelled.
The product shall store new conference rooms.
The system shall allow a Program Administrator/Nursing Staff Member to move a student from one clinical lab section to another clinical lab section corresponding to the same clinical class.
The current repair facility ratings shall be displayed to the user.
The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.
The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.
Users should be able to access their streaming movies in under 2 clicks after logging into the website.
In the case of an unsuccessful completion, exception processing outlined in the On-line Exception Processing section is performed
All design, testing and installation of EIRENE mobile radio equipment shall comply with the quality procedures defined in ISO 9001 . Climatic conditions
A speech connection shall be established immediately following the warning tone, to allow the originator of the emergency call, to give information concerning the nature of the emergency.
The DPU-TMALI shall allocate a ring buffer of size specified by TMALI_BUFFER_SIZE provided during initialization for storing incoming frames of data. The default buffer size shall be 15 MB.
The DPU-DCI shall read from the DCI Memory in B-bit words only, using the load multiple/store multiple instructions.
All actions that modify an existing dispute case must be recorded in the case history.
It shall be possible for the user to find and display stored numbers and their information.
ETCS shall calculate the permitted speed for the train for all locations of the authorised movement.
The product shall display the grids within a circle as a view from a periscope.
When applicable a Security Domain shall Provide cryptographic protection services for its own Applications during their personalization and optionally during their subsequent operation,

Policies and procedures should be in place for determining when follow up and isolation and quarantine monitoring should be done as a part of a focused countermeasure administration and response effort, rather than as a function of contact exposure tracing.
The CNG may act as a proxy for handling messages (requests and responses) related to the remote access scenarios to and from the home.
Each investigation subject may be associated with exposure contacts, including unambiguous links to contacts in other jurisdictions.
If the call is a broadcast call, the user shall be informed that he cannot speak as part of the broadcast call.
The PSAM authenticates that the purchase transaction being canceled was performed by the PSAM, and that the transaction being canceled is part of the active batch

The Disputes System shall allow the user to create or initiate a chargeback request. The system must prompt the user to enter the required information to initiate a chargeback request. The chargeback request results in a printed chargeback notification that is sent to merchant indicating that their account will be charged back if no proof is provided that the disputed transaction is valid.
Avoiding link overload: Text pages containing large proportions of links should be formatted so that the presence of links does not impede the readability of the text.
The website will comply with W3C standards.
The product shall be able to store new room equipment.
The CNG shall allow the customer remote access to a CND in the Customer Network, for example a surveillance video camera.
The system should have capability to support public access to a subset of data andfunctionality
Internally to the CPN, a CNG transmitting private or other critical information (i.e. to a CND) shall protect the data from unauthorised disclosure.
The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.
The system shall filter data by: Venues and Key Events.
Protocols adaptation for control plane or management plane may be performed by CNG.
The product shall be expected to operate for at least 5 years for each customer installation.
The DPU-BOOT CSC shall disable write-protection of the EEPROM on the SCM.

If the POS device supports multiple applications or multiple transaction types, an interaction between the terminal and consumer or sales agent determines the CEP application and the function to be performed (cancel last purchase transaction)
The card verification method indicator (CVMI) in the CEP card must specify support of online PIN verification and at least one method of off-line PIN verification (encrypted or unencrypted)
All credit card information will be secured on the server and only accessible by authorized Izogn administrators. Information will be encrypted in the database.
The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.
It shall also be possible, to allow the driver to change the adhesion conditions
The VCD system MUST provide an interface where an economic operator can add structural data of evidence that belong to specific evidence.
The DPU-CCM shall provide a mechanism for other CSCs to report errors for inclusion in the DPU_HK.
System shall let customers register on the website as a ï¿½pay as you goï¿½ user in under 5 minutes.
In the case of a reversal, the CEP card must re-authenticate the PSAM
Classes for a given cohort shall not conflict with regards to the time and day that they are offered.
The product will record meeting acknowledgements.
The system will use the stored e-mail addresses as a primary means of communicating information to affected parties.

The PSAM must only be permitted to aggregate transactions for a scheme with which the merchant has an aggregation agreement. The AID of the card application must be used to determine the scheme. For each scheme that allows this merchant to perform aggregation, the PSAM must have a monetary amount above which it is not permitted to aggregate
If the transaction is to be aggregated, the amount of the transaction must be added to the aggregation record for the card issuer
The appearance of the product shall appear professional
Information shall be recorded to an accuracy which enables a clear view of the functioning of ETCS and way the traction unit has been driven.
When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.
level of certainty that the radio and MMI are working.
On indication received at the CNG of a resource allocation expiry the CNG shall delete all residual data associated with the invocation of the resource.

Once the driver has accepted the standard point-to-point call, it shall be connected appropriately, eg if the driver has accepted the call by lifting the handset, then the call shall be routed to the handset.
The group identity of the voice group call (VBS or VGCS) shall be displayed.

For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.

The CNG shall take action according to local authentication failure handling policy (which may include silently discarding the authentication and explicit failure notification, or in the case of a replay of credentials may include notification of the true owner of the credentials) upon detection of failure during identification, authentication and authorization.
The Development Team shall be required to adjust existing source code to follow acceptedcoding standards only if that source code must be modified.
The Bootstrap Monitor of the DPU-BOOT CSC shall validate commands entered for syntax and number of arguments.
Card capture, where the card is pulled into the interior of a load device so that it may not be retrieved by the cardholder, may be supported at the issuerâ€™s option and if the device is capable
A customer can only stream a movie if they purchased it and are within the 2 day viewing period.
Off-line PIN verification must include both encrypted and unencrypted PIN
The Disputes System must provide the ability to view existing dispute cases.
Expired cards must not be used for loading electronic value
The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.
The CNG and the Customer Network shall assure the confidentiality, the integrity of signalling/control/media and management flows.
It shall be possible to manually select Shunting from Stand By operation, Full Supervision operation or Partial Supervision operation
It should be possible to transfer text messages between ground and mobile through the EIRENE system.
The load acquirer must notify the card issuer of all suspect transactions
The trainborne equipment shall remain in Full Supervision until the trainborne equipment is not active any longer, when Shunting is selected or when Partial Supervision information is received.
Context specific data MUST be machine interpretable
The DPU-CCM shall monitor the status of DPU-SCUI, DPU-CCM, DPU-DCX, DPU-TMALI, and DPU-DPA by examining their TASK_INFO and report this information in DPU_HK.

Depending on the operation mode chosen (bridged or touted) and on the type of flow treated (unicast or multicast) the CNG shall forward packets only to the physical interfaces which are connected to devices interested to the IPTV flow.
If the number of logical channels supported by the OPEN is not sufficient to open a new Supplementary Logical Channel, return the appropriate error.

The website should have an African feel but should not alienate non-Africans. The website should use animation on pages which are describing the services to grab the users attention and encourage them to sign up.
The DPU-TIS shall provide the capability for an application program to jam the value of the SC_TIME into the hardware, if automatic time synchronization is disabled.
The DPU-TIS shall provide TIS_HK to the DPU-CCM on request.

Where an on-train bus is connected to the Cab radio, deregistration of functional numbers can be performed on an individual basis and also by the train driver, by one action for all users (including the driver), at the end of the journey when the train number is no longer associated with the train.
The DPU-ADC shall report errors to an application program by setting the ERRNO task variable and returning ERROR.
The washing process must use a non binding neutral data format such as xml when receiving and processing lead data.
The VCD viewing system MUST provide a functionality to authenticate contracting authorities to view the data contained within a VCD package.
When a game is ended the product shall allow each player to identify himself or herself as an available player in the list of players.
It should be possible for calls to be answered automatically according to incoming call priority as defined
The interaction protocol between Web Server-SR, SR-mediator is defined.
The image mode shall consist of a science window.
The leads washing functionality will have an interface in which lead data parameters can be maintained.
Izogn Administrator must be able to add new products to the website within 2 minutes.
CPN should support storage of UGC within the CPN.
The system shall locate the preferred repair facility with the highest ratings for the input criteria
The DPU-SCUI, in the event of a buffer full condition, shall discard new data, return an error to the caller, and report an error condition to the DPU-CCM.

Systems supporting OM must be able to exchange aggregated data. Examples of aggregated data to be supported are: number of cases, number of contacts per case, and number of vaccinations and/or treatments administered.

Systems supporting OM should generate electronic data dictionaries for dynamic data (or other user-defined data descriptions to assist with effective data exchange), line lists, activity logs, aggregate data, and call-back lists to assist the emergency response group and investigators in responding to and containing a health event.
The functional number shall consist of numeric characters only.
Systems supporting OM must have the capability to capture data about any conveyance involved in an OM investigation, including: type of conveyance, route taken (e.g., flight number), etc.
The DPU-CCM shall support a NOOP command that does nothing but serve as a valid command.
The CNG shall support mechanisms for secure authentication and communication with the remote management system.

The product and/or dependent databases/filesystems shall remain operational as a result of the input of malicious data. The product and/or dependent databases/filesystems shall not crash 100% of the time that malicious data is input into the product.
The CMA report shall be returned no later 60 seconds after the user has entered the CMA report criteria.

Epidemiological (epi) data must be collected to assist in the case investigation of events. Standard epi data to be collected includes: onset date and time of symptoms, type of symptoms, risk factors, medical history data, laboratory data, procedure data, and questionnaire responses.

During a purchase transaction, the CEP card must ensure that it is dealing with an authentic POS device, and it must generate a signature to allow the card issuer to verify the integrity of the transaction
Using train data and infrastructure data, braking curves shall be calculated taking into account the target information but not the location of vehicles occupying the track.
The concept of the Life Cycle of the card (see section 5.1 - Card Life Cycle) may be used to determine the security level of the communication between the card and an off-card entity.

The electronic purse product must use dynamic data authentication at the following points: 1. Load 2. Unload 3. Currency Exchange 4. Purchase, Purchase Reversal 5. Incremental Purchase 6. Cancel Last Purchase 7. Personalization 8. On-line Updates to the Application
Every user of the system shall be authenticated and authorized.
The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.
The driver shall be informed if a broadcast call is ongoing by a visual indication displayed on the MMI.
When observing a new GRB, and the XRT_POS becomes available from the ICU, the DPU-DPA shall shift and resize the image and event windows appropriately.
All business rules specified in the Disputes System shall be in compliance with the Merchant Operating Regulations.

There may be multiple certification authorities that manage keys for the system, including the possibility of one overall highest level certification authority (perhaps on an international level), and domestic certification authorities for each country or region
The timing of payment to the merchant must be established between the merchant and the merchant acquirer
Each team owner will need to use a username and password in order to be authenticated to reach the team ownerï¿½s page
No lead evaluation will complete in a time period longer than 25 seconds for 97% of all leads processed.
Direct access to attestations issued by (national) issuing bodies MUST be established through organisational agreements (e.g. service level agreements).
Every pilot partner MUST follow the common standard schema of context specific data by defining a national version of it.
The product shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the realtor community.
The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.
The CNG shall support a mechanism allowing the support of call forwarding toward non-IMS capable CNDs.
The response time of general student management tasks shall take no longer than 5 seconds and the response time of schedule generation shall take no longer than 30 seconds.
After investigation, if the merchant acquirer decides, based on scheme rules, to accept the transactions, a method must exist to settle them and forward them to the card issuer
The CNG may interact with the Resource and Admission Control Subsystem (RACS) as defined in ES 282 001 [9] to support remote real-time QoS control

The Dispute System shall provide the users with the ability to follow up on a dispute case via follow-up actions. The list of available follow up actions for a given dispute case must be filtered by the status of the case and the access level of the user.
Rreports must be easy to generate. eports must be generated within one button click and exported within one button click (after selecting the report)

All members of the shunting group, other than the initiator of the link assurance signal, shall be unable to speak during the transmission of the link assurance signal. However, they shall be able to initiate a shunting emergency call at any time.
A VCD system must provide a functionality to retrieve actual instances of outdated evidences
It shall be possible for an incoming call or data message for one user to be forwarded to another user using functionality provided by the network.
The Bootstrap Monitor of the DPU-BOOT CSC shall follow the protocol specified in BSPS-01, Bootstrap Monitor Protocol Specification, with the following noted exceptions.

Systems supporting OM must have the capability to capture data about locations involved in an OM investigation, including: name (if applicable), type (e.g., floor, building, room, store), street address, city, state, zip code, country, GPS coordinates, and other specific details (e.g., a specific building on a campus, a business branch location, a local chapter’s meeting hall)
Once the call is terminated, the continuous visual alarm indication in the cab shall cease.
A non-clinical class shall specify the course name lecture room requirements and instructor needs.
Cab radios shall provide a means of preventing tampering.
If run-time diagnostics are implemented, all failures should be available to be recorded in a train-borne recorder.
The website design should be modern clean and concise.
The load device also provides for verification of the identity of the cardholder (with either on-line or off-line PIN verification) and forwards verification data in the authorization request
CNDs connected to the CPN and devoted to specific managed services shall be remotely manageable
The DPU-CCM shall, in rejecting a command, report an error in DPU_HK indicating the byte-code of the command being rejected in the LSB of the errno as described in 03691-DPUSDP-01.
The system shall follow HIPAA compliance capabilities in new functionality introduced to the system.
The confirmation shall be generated automatically without input from the user.
After the 30 second period, if the connection was unsuccessful, the system shall provide another audible and visual indication that it was unable to connect the call.
Enter/leave direct mode
The Bootstrap CSC shall address hardware modules as defined in document 1400, Company X Specification for the Company X Communication/Memory Module.

Only the last increment of an incremental purchase may be reversed. A reversal of a purchase transaction may only occur if: the CEP card has not been removed from the POS device, and the S5 for the transaction to be reversed has not been generated by the PSAM
In some countries, train numbers are alphanumeric. Support for such numbers is not required for interoperability.
Specification of keys and signatures used for CEPS on-line authentication is left to the issuer, however MACs passed over shared networks must be no more than 8 bytes long, binary format
The character set used shall support different languages.
The numbering for other teams shall be treated in the same way as maintenance teams
If an ETCS equipped train passes a level transition to one or more levels for which it is not equipped, ETCS shall initiate a brake application.
Website shall request and authorize credit card payment before allowing a user to stream a movie.
For increased security and convenience, asymmetric cryptography must be used as the authentication security for off-line transactions
The driver shall be able to override the function when the train is stationary.
In order to ensure interoperability, the service is optional for the ground and mandatory for the Cab radio.

Data describing the health event should be captured, including the reason for the investigation, the category of event (e.g. environmental, infectious), the date the event began, the suspected agent (if known) or investigation focus, the geographic area impacted by the event, as well as the event status (e.g., open, closed).
The new target location shall be checked for acceptance by the on board.
viewing a movie details the website will display the movies description actor and director entered in by the administrator.

The DPU-BIT shall perform two write/read/compare tests on the RAM for the MIL-STD-1553B. The first test shall construct and write half-word (16-bit) values obtained by adding the upper and lower half-words of each each memory address. The second test shall construct and write the one’s complement of the half-word values used in the first test.
The VCD system MUST detect which attestations can be used by this feature (e.g. they have to be sufficiently described through context specific data and structural data of evidence).
If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver.
The product shall generate a CMA report in an acceptable time.

The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.
The VCD package MUST provide a functionality to add structural VCD package data to the VCD package and VCD system (e.g. log file) during the compilation process.
These merchant acquirers must then assign unique identifiers to PSAMs
The Application Provider is responsible for Generating the keys for its own Security Domains or obtaining Security Domain keys from a trusted third party,
An audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver that the call is proceeding.
The DPU-EDAC shall contain a background task which walks DRAM to trip single-bit errors (SBEs).
The product shall provide Portals.The product shall help System Administrators to analyze the transactions with ad-hoc reporting and KPIs (Key Performance Indicators)
The CNG shall be associated with a unique Hardware ID to be used for identification NGN side.
The DPU-CCM shall collect a TASK_HBEAT from DPU-SCUI, DPU-CCM, DPU-DCX, DPU-TMALI, and DPU-DPA . Non-responsive tasks will be reported in DPU_HK.
A driver shall be able to initiate the establishment of a call to other drivers with a minimum of action (eg a single keystroke).

The card issuer generates S2, which is sent to the card to allow the card to validate the card issuerâ€™s authenticity and to ensure that the data used by the card in the transaction is the same as the card issuer intended
Point-to-point calls that are not automatically answered (see table 10-1) shall only be answered once the driver accepts the call.
CNDs connected to the CPN and devoted to specific NGN managed services shall be remotely manageable.
The emergency call button shall be red and shall be protected against accidental use.

Reports generated by systems supporting OM should clearly indicate the number of cases, the number of contacts per case, the number of cases with no known epi-link at the time of diagnosis, the laboratory results, and the number of vaccinations and/or treatments administered.
The transaction signatures ensure end to end integrity of transmitted data for load, unload, and currency exchange transactions
The product shall poll the system for messages every second.The product shall poll the system for new messages at a maximum of every 1 second.
It shall be possible to implement one or more of the ETCS application levels on a line.
The DPU-DPA shall be capable of collecting detector events over the full FOV.
Every on-train function shall be identified by a unique standard number.

The CNG Remote Management requires to manage a specific set of parameters. At least the following list of parameters shall be available: Customer Identification, Physical Line Identification, list of subscribed services, CNG IP address.
The load device must support on-line PIN encryption or off-line PIN verification
The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.
There DPU-DPA shall have three science modes, X, Y mode, and X/Y mode.

Systems supporting OM should capture or be linked to data regarding the prophylaxis or treatment to cases, exposed individuals, or at risk persons, including the person who ordered the prophylaxis or treatment, and the name, date, type, duration, and dosage of the treatment or prophylaxis given. For specific data requirements regarding the administration of prophylaxis and treatment, please reference PHIN Preparedness Countermeasure/Response Administration Functional Requirements and Process Flows, available at www.cdc.gov/phin.
Share one or more MAC keys with connecting processors, create a MAC on each transmission sent to another processor, and verify the MAC on each transmission received from another processor
The compilation suggestion that is given to the economic operator by the VCD system MUST be reliable with regard to fulfilment of tender-specific requirements.
The system shall allow a Program Administrator or Nursing staff member to remove a student from a clinical lab section.
The Basic Logical Channel is the permanently available interface to a GlobalPlatform card and shall be supported by the OPEN.
The issuer sends S2 to the load acquirer in the authorization response message
The DPU-TIS shall read from the SCM registers in B-bit words only.
The product shall be available 24 hours per day seven days per week.
The CNG should detect replayed user and/or device credentials.

Activity logs, which are tools for investigators to track their actions during a case, should be supported. For example, investigators may log calls made to monitor symptoms or calls made to schedule follow-up visits.
A continuous visual indication that the emergency function has been activated shall be provided at the originating and all receiving terminals.
The VCD system MUST have an interface to submit/upload evidence that have to be provided manually by the economic operator.
The product shall be updated on a regular basis.The product will have a new major feature introduced every six months and quarterly maintenance releases every six months.
The DPU-DPA shall collect event mode data, preserving the time and spatial resolution in the specified event window.
If contact with the mobile radio network is lost, then the Cab radio shall give an audible and visual indication.
A primary database will be used to store cached data for active users.
The load acquirer must keep records by card number of all loads that take place at its load devices
It shall be possible for a user to override the automatic network selection manually. This function shall not be available during calls.

The product shall be capable of handling up to 1.000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.
Each team owner will need to use a username and password in order to be authenticated to reach the team owners page
Card capture, where the card is pulled into the interior of a load device so that it may not be retrieved by the cardholder, may be supported at the issuer's option and if the device is capable
System shall let customers register on the website as a pay as you go user in under 5 minutes.

For both the SELECT [by name] [first or only occurrence] command and the SELECT [by name] [next occurrence] command, an Application becomes the selected Application on the Basic Logical Channel if: The requested AID matches (fully or partially) the Applications AID, The Application being selected is in the correct Life Cycle State, The Application has no restrictions due to multi-selection, and supports the current card interface.

User access should be limited to the permissions granted to their role(s) Each level in the PCG hierarchy will be assigned a role and users will be assigned to these roles. Access to functionality within RFS system is dependent on the privileges/permission assigned to the role.
The terminal must secure transactions by retaining the card's symmetric MACing key signature as part of the transaction
Perform the calculation required to generate a signature using the PSAM's private RSA key, to allow the CEP card to validate the PSAM
